ing: 1 (1 pound) loaf day-old bread, cut into 1 inch cubes
des: "A vegan bread salad perfect for taking to pot-lucks. The longer it sits around, the better it gets, and no one will miss the meat!"
ins: In a large bowl, whisk together the olive oil, balsamic vinegar, tomato juice, basil, salt, and pepper. Toss with the cubed bread, tofu, tomatoes, and spinach just before serving.
